metadata.title: CVE-2024-4557 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple Denial of Service (DoS) conditions has been discovered in GitLabCE/EE affecting all versions starting from 1.0 prior to 16.11.5, startingfrom 17.0 prior to 17.0.3, and starting from 17.1 prior to 17.1.1 whichallowed an attacker to cause resource exhaustion via banzai pipeline.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
